title: Demand outstrips radar satellite supply
summary: NASA announced plans to integrate ICEYE US's SAR data into its Commercial Smallsat Data Acquisition program under a five-year indefinite-delivery, indefinite-quantity contract after evaluating its suitability for NASA Earth Science research.
why_it_matters: This contract signifies growing recognition of commercial SAR data's value for civil government applications and Earth science research, expanding ICEYE's market beyond defense and national security.
